features: Freedom of movement: The soft, lightweight fabric and active fit make it easy to move, however steep the slope or fast your pace
Durable comfort: The 4-way stretch fabric is also really durable meaning this short will last
Outdoor versatile: Effortlessly adapts with belt hooks, strategic pockets and a fly opening
Belt loops: Wide belt loops accommodate most belts
4 Way stretch: The fabric stretches in all 4 directions with the support of elastic yarns
